title: Mohsin Naqvi commends security forces for successful operations against Khawarji terrorists in KP
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 05 (APP): Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi has commended the security forces for their two successful operations against Khawarji terrorists in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
He applauded the security forces for eliminating 8 Khawarji terrorists in the operations.
Mohsin Naqvi praised the security forces, saying, “We salute the security forces for their successful operations against fitna al khawarij in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
The security forces have once again foiled the nefarious designs of foreign terrorists by taking timely action.”
Interior Minister emphasized that there is no room for terrorists in the country, adding the nation stands with the security forces in the war against terrorism.
